verbs.description: peru [ARG0: congress] [V: passes] [ARG1: bill to grant fujimori house arrest] peru congress rushed through a law to grant house arrest for some elderly convicts as opposition lawmakers sought to prevent former autocrat alberto fujimori returning to jail after his political pardon was revoked peru bloomberg grant fujimori
